item.title: How to use Docker? (Review Pt. 2)
item.description:
How to use Docker? (Review Pt. 2)

I explained the docker fundamentals in Explaining Docker (Review Pt. 1). To find and develop strategies of how to use docker it is vital to have a solid understanding of the docker components. Now that we try and navigate through the different ideas of what docker could be used for I want to make sure that the concepts behind docker a clear.

item.title: docker
item.description: I've been busy writing a couple of blog posts about docker. Y'all have a look here: https://simonopitz.me
